attributes.action: Grant SIA (Security licence) for any tier 2 visa workers
attributes.additional_details:
So many of us don't have good salaries and its not enough for daily living expenses.
We get tired working 5 days but want to work more for money but after 5 days our body gets week.

We want security licence as in this job we can sit, relax and earn some more extra money
attributes.background: So far we can't make sia licence on our tier 2 visa, we want government to accept this petition and start new law for security licence for tier 2 wrokers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

People who have a right to work in the UK but are not UK nationals can already apply for an SIA licence, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about applying for an SIA licence here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/apply-for-an-sia-licence
